main.name: Digdarshan Kunwar
main.description: I am a Computer Science major student at Jacobs University Bremen, passively looking for internship/job opportunities in Software and Web Development. I want to further develop my creative skills, technological expertise & innovative thoughts.
main.bio: I am a Front End developer with industry experience building websites and web applications. I specialize in JavaScript and have professional experience working with Python and React. I also have experience working with Vue, Wordpress and Express.Js.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
